metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2817 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The WebExtension sandbox feature in browser/components/extensions/ext-tabs.js in Mozilla Firefox before 46.0 does not properly restrict principal inheritance during chrome.tabs.create and chrome.tabs.update API calls, which allows remote attackers to conduct Universal XSS (UXSS) attacks via a crafted extension that accesses a (1) javascript: or (2) data: URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
